title: Power cut plans for Tuesday announced : No night time scheduled cuts
content: 3 Hours power interruption will be carried out by CEB/LECO during 8.30am to 5.30pm tomorrow (March 1, 2022) for all groups.However, 30 minutes unscheduled power shedding may take place, if necessary ONLY during the night peak to manage excess demand. Therefore consumers are kindly advised to reduce consumption between 6pm. to 10 pm. (Night peak ) to avoid interruption.
